channel.title: Stop certain items from being in the wild?
channel.description:
how do i make it so that people can't bring like a skillcape or a godsword to the wild?
and sends them a message like "You cannot take blah blah blah to the wild"

put in boolean process if you wish…

item.title: Stop certain items from being in the wild?
item.dc:creator: @bryanc Bryanc
item.description:
@bryanc wrote:

Look at my post… and even better one here…

if (!nonWildy()) { // Checks if wild if (playerHasItem == **** || playerHasItem == ****) // Checks items { teleportToX = x; // Teleport Out of wild, X teleportToY = y; // Teleport Out of wild Y sendMessage("You can not wear the items in this list (::hax) into wild"); } }

Should work … I think…

item.title: Stop certain items from being in the wild?
item.dc:creator: @kiwon kiwon
item.description:
@kiwon wrote:

[quote=“delta, post:2, topic:168655”]Put in boolean process()

if(playerEquipment[playerCape] == CAPEID && !nonWildy()){
sendMessage(“You cannot take blah blah blah to the wild”);
teleportToX = x
teleportToY = y
}[/quote]so for just regular items i change playerCape with playerItem?

Read full topic
item.source: Stop certain items from being in the wild?

item.title: Stop certain items from being in the wild?
item.dc:creator: @bryanc Bryanc
item.description:
@bryanc wrote:

Total guess…

Do like the:

if (absY <= #### && absY >= #### && absX >= #### && absX <= ####) { // Checks if wild if (playerHasItem == **** || playerHadItem == ****) // Checks items { teleportToX = x; // Teleport Out of wild, X teleportToY = y; // Teleport Out of wild Y sendMessage("You can not wear the items in this list (::hax) into wild"); } }
Where,
####, is the coords
****, is the item (you can add more)
x, x value out of wild
y, y value out of wild

Then add a menu with a command to display it, saying the items you cannot wear into wild.

Read full topic

Put in boolean process()

teleportToX = x
teleportToY = y
}
